nodes.text: DL-X2 was a Veril Line Systems DL-series security droid that worked for the Star Tours travel agency. He was stationed in Sector 2 of the spaceport.
DL-X2 was a droid created as part of the Star Tours ride for Disneyland California. Hasbro released DL-X2 as an exclusive Star Tours action figure.

The DL-X2's design was reused and modified prop of a character from the 3rd season of the TV police drama series Hill Street Blues, TK4600. The TK4600, and by extension, the DL-X2's design, was created by Imagineering, which frequently designed stuff for Disney.
